SCORING: Begin the game by pressing 'START GAME'. Five points are awarded for successful word searches for the first minute.

After each minute, the amount of points you receive decreases by 1

A bonus is awarded at the end of the game! You get 20 points if you beat it in the first minute. However, the bonus decreases by five points each minute.

HOW TO PLAY: If you see a word, select the first letter then the last letter.

Careful though, an unsuccessful word search will subtract a point from your score!
